attributes.action: Please Help Make Housing Rents Equal And Treat All Tenants Fairly
attributes.additional_details: Please Sign And Help Stop Stockport Homes From Charging Selective Tennants 50% More Rent Than The Rest Of There Tennants New And Old, To Help Pay Funding For The New Build Houses And Leaving People Stuggling To Pay The Extra Rent Specially Those Affected By The Benefit Cap, I'm A Single Parent With 5 Children Facing Loosin My Home Due To Being Treated Unfairly
